entry.title: Finland Plans Next Step in NATO Bid as Ukraine Mounts Counteroffensive
entry.content: Finnish President Sauli Niinist√∂ said the government would apply for membership in the North Atlantic Treaty Organization subject to approval by parliament, which is widely expected, in the coming days.

entry.title: Russian Soldiers Shot Three Brothers and Threw Them in a Grave. One Survived.
entry.content: After Mykola Kulichenko was taken from his village in Ukraine, interrogated, beaten and left for dead, he still had to get back home. His account is among many war-crimes cases Ukrainian prosecutors are building against Russia.
